title: Angular I18n Editor Configuration
description: The configuration file for `vscode-ng-i18n-editor` VSCode Extension

locales.title: The target LCID collection
locales.description: LCID is a string contains language code and region info, eg: 'zh-CN', 'en-US', 'ja-JP', 'th-TH', etc...

translationSaveOn.description: Defines when to save the translation.

messageLocations.description: The source message (angular-cli generated file) locations related to the current vscode workspace.

oneOf.description: use the xliff specify in the `messageLocations` as source and auto generate the target translation xliff based on the given `translationFileNamePattern`
edit directly on the target xliff (based on the `messageLocations` and the given `translationFileNamePattern`)

emptyTranslationHandling.description:
Determine how to handle empty translation. 
 If not specified, extension will set this to: 
 * `delete`: when editor is in `default` mode;
 * `fallback-to-source`: when editor is in `target-file` mode.

oneOf.description: delete the trans unit in the target xliff when empty
keep the trans unit in the target xliff and mark as `need-translation`
fill the translation target using the source string and mark as `need-translation`

intervalSeconds.description: the frequency of task checking (default 5 seconds)

itemEachPack.description: the maximum command size for each task execution
